description:
This is a market on whether 'Mufasa: The Lion King' (2024) or 'Sonic 3' (2024) will gross more domestically on their opening weekend. The “Box Office” tab on https://the-numbers.com/movie/Mufasa-The-Lion-King-(2024)#tab=box-office and https://the-numbers.com/movie/Sonic-the-Hedgehog-3-(2024)#tab=box-office will be used to resolve this market once the values for the 3-day opening weekend (December 20 - 22) for each film are final (i.e. not studio estimates).

This market will resolve to "Mufasa" if 'Mufasa: The Lion King' (2024) grosses more than what 'Sonic 3' (2024) grosses on its 3-day domestic opening weekend. 
This market will resolve to "Sonic" if 'Sonic 3' (2024) grosses more than what 'Mufasa: The Lion King' (2024) grosses on its 3-day domestic opening weekend.
If both films gross exactly the same amount, this market will resolve 50-50.

Please note, this market will resolve according to the The Numbers figures provided under Weekend Box Office Performance for the 3-day weekend (which typically includes Thursday's previews), regardless of whether domestic refers to only the USA, or to USA and Canada, etc.

If there is no final data available by December 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, another credible resolution source will be chosen.

markets.question: 'Mufasa' vs. 'Sonic 3' opening weekend box office?

title: 'Mufasa' vs. 'Sonic 3' opening weekend box office?
